message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
I think we can do better. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor. This accounts for the decreasing value of the money with each round, and hopefully we can reach a quick and fair agreement.
Bob, your offer is too risky for me given the fast inflation. I propose a 55/45 split. It's a good deal considering the money is losing value quickly for both of us.
